com.rohanclan.cfml.dictionary
Class DictionaryManager

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.dictionary.DictionaryManager
public class DictionaryManager
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Rob This class loads all the dictionaries and can be used to get specific dictionaries. This (hopefully) well help in abstracting the dictionaries not intended to be instantiated
